        Parameters:
        name - the name of the step to insert
        initialDate - the initial date of the step to insert
        finalDate - the final date of the step to insert

      • updateStep

        public boolean updateStep​(int idStep,
                          java.lang.String nameStep,
                          java.util.Date initialDate,
                          java.util.Date finalDate,
                          int idBoard,
                          int stateStep,
                          int difficultyStep,
                          java.lang.String description)
        updates a step from the database
        Specified by:
        updateStep in interface StepDAO
        Parameters:
        idStep - the ID of the step to update
        nameStep - the new value of the name of the step to update
        initialDate - the new value of the initial date of the step to update
        finalDate - the new value of the final date of the step to update
        idBoard - the new value of the board associated to the step to update
        stateStep - the new value of the state of the step to update
        difficultyStep - the new value of the difficulty of the step to update
        description - the new value of the description of the step to update
        Returns:
        true if the step was successfully updated
